extendedInfo.description: Dreams and other tales in one fantasy world...Once upon a fairyland in the all-new 3D social game, Magic Tree!!Imagine a farm with more than just regular harvest...Magical trees filled with other enchantments: sweet candy trees, sparkling jewel trees, cottony cloud trees...Nothing's impossible in this surreal land of unusual trees. Dreams and other tales in one fantasy world...Once upon a fairyland in the all-new 3D social game, Magic Tree!!Imagine a farm with more than just regular harvest...Magical trees filled with other enchantments: sweet candy trees, sparkling jewel trees, cottony cloud trees...Nothing's impossible in this surreal land of unusual trees. Experience the three-dimensional fantasy that will blow your mind away in Magic Tree!âFEATURE HIGHLIGHTSââ¶Magic Seeds that grow to become Magic TreesMix and match magic seeds to discover new types of trees. Bone-chilling Skeleton Trees, Fairy-telling Fairy Trees, and other mysterious trees are waiting to be revealed.â¶ Glowing 3D GraphicsNo more flat social gaming! Your visuals are more solid and vivid in 3D. Enjoy the freedom to customize your village with more colors.â¶Animated Village FeaturesNo matter how great the graphics are, it would be no fun without motion, right?Ride and play with the decorative items in Magic Tree. Explore a fantastic social journey with the background: Merry-go-rounds, swings, pianos, and more! Play a piece on the piano, or rest on a chair whenever you want.â¶Another Me, My AvatarCustomize your gender, clothes, accessories, hair style, and facial expression however you wish.Represent another you by designing your character that plants trees, wanders around villages, and harvests crops.â¶Fantastic Crops and AnimalsAlong with unique trees, you can raise other exclusive animals and crops. Start a collection with various trophies and enjoy growing your own farm.â¶Visiting FriendsSend and receive messages and gifts... reviews.title: c:
reviews.comment: Pretty great so far. Easy to pick up, pleasant musical score, visually interesting stylistic models.
reviews.author: Patrick Webber

reviews.title: VERY fun, easy to play
reviews.comment: This game is as relaxing as I hoped and as cute as can be. Works great on my nook
reviews.author: C Radiwon

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: very fun I love it but mabey the energy could regenerate faster mabey just a little but other than that very fun
reviews.author: Isabel Carley

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This game is fun and adorable, easy to play, and helps you make new friends.
reviews.author: Sydney Petet

reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.comment: This game is super cute and fun to pass the time with. Works great on my Droid Razor HD.
reviews.author: Roxanne Anderson

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great ! Have Really Great Graphics And Excellent Game Play. Keep Up The Good Work!
reviews.author: Teo Charlene

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very good game. I love the graphics theyre cute a really good game to pass the time
reviews.author: Giovany Diaz

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: This game has a cute style and it\'s fun. Definately the only game where I was able to makr my character.
reviews.author: Naikia Felder

reviews.title: awesome!
reviews.comment: fave game ever, super cute and no problems at all, love it!
reviews.author: M Marowak

reviews.title: Best farming games
reviews.comment: In my opinion it is the best farming games. There\'s character customization. Cute graphic and great story.
reviews.author: Ananda Akbar

reviews.title: wonderful
reviews.comment: this is a great game. love every time i harvest and plant, its fun. the graphic is so good and com2us has many great games.
reviews.author: little max

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: !! Edit!! 7.13.13 Why not let players make a profit from raising their animals here, too? That way they can have more fun upgrading their animal population in their town. ... But there is always room for improvement. I love that it plays smoothly and the graphics are well made. Continue with the good work!
reviews.author: Silver Nightingale

reviews.title: Too Cute!
reviews.comment: I love spending time playing this game. The mood is slow & chill, which is refreshingly different from the other games I play. The graphics are so adorable!
reviews.author: Kristen Bunyard

reviews.title: Great cute game
reviews.comment: The graphics are cute and the game is filled with fun features, and its not that hard to get stars. I also love how you can buy different outfits.
reviews.author: Jeff Moon

reviews.title: Good!!
reviews.comment: Fun!! Very cute I love it so much And spend of time to play :DDDDDDDDDD
reviews.author: MIREORS SO

reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.comment: This is sooo cute, its anime,  and easy to play soooo fun!
reviews.author: Lorren Nunn

reviews.title: Simple and fun
reviews.comment: I love farming on Magic Tree. It\'s a fun game in bite size pieces. I play during my breaks at work. Keeps me from being late on my breaks.
reviews.author: Vic Welch

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love magic tree its really fun and relaxing and enjoying
reviews.author: Darky Barky

reviews.title: Awesome 3D game :3
reviews.comment: Love the game. I think it\'s super cute and really fun. Only downside is that it constantly has to force close and I\'ve had to uninstall and reinstall it a couple times. But I enjoy it enough to continue to play. Good stuff :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great graphics
reviews.comment: I love this cute and simple game (: everything flows smoothly and the designs are adorable.
reviews.author: Kat Peralta
